evil promotes a piece: one of Evil's pieces gets to the other side and she promotes it to a different type
evil swears: Evil swears, this counts regardless of how "tame" the swear is, so "dumbass" would count
evil mentions being evil: Evil mentions being evil or that being evil is her whole thing, including saying that evil is in her name
evil castles: Evil makes the king move 2 spaces towards a rook on the same rank, and then moves the rook to the square the king passed over
evil makes a strange noise: Evil's voice model outputs a weird sound compared to subtitle output
evil calls herself a god/goddess: Evil refers to herself as a god or goddess
evil gloats while losing: Evil gloats despite actually losing the game at the time. Losing is considered to be having less pieces and/or being in check
